name: Desert Jumper
description:
Title: Desert Jumper

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You play as a small alien maneuvering across sandy platforms by moving sideways and jumping between them. Your score builds over time and you fail the game by getting caught offscreen to the left or falling between the platforms.

Instructions: Press up to begin the game. Up/w to jump, left/a to move left, and right/d to move right. Falling or moving off the screen results in a game over. Press return to restart the game after a death.

Game Design Team: Liam Vaughn – Game Designer
